questions.question_text: Āshrayet Sahajānandam Harim Brahmā’kṣharam tathā । Guṇātītam gurum prītyā mumukṣhuh ___________ ॥ 20 ॥
questions.explanation: The complete shlok is: Āshrayet Sahajānandam Harim Brahmā’kṣharam tathā । Guṇātītam gurum prītyā mumukṣhuh svātma-muktaye ॥ 20 ॥

questions.question_text: “māyā taravāno upāy e chhe je, jyāre sarva karma ane māyā teno nāsh karanārā ne māyāthī par je sākṣhātkār Shrī Puruṣhottam Bhagwān athavā te Bhagwānnā maḷel sant temanī jīvne prāpti jyāre thāy chhe tyāre temanā āshraythī māyā ullanghāy chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Jetalpur 1.

questions.question_text: “Bhagwān ne Bhagwānnā sant e ja kalyāṇkārī chhe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Gadhada Middle 59.

questions.question_text: Mumukṣhu potānā ātmānī mukti māṭe Sahajānand Shrīhari tathā Akṣharbrahma swarūp guṇātīt _________ prītie karīne āsharo kare.
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: Mumukṣhu potānā ātmānī mukti māṭe Sahajānand Shrīhari tathā Akṣharbrahma swarūp guṇātīt guruno prītie karīne āsharo kare.

questions.question_text: “Jene Bhagwānno ne santno māhātmya-gnāne sahit nishchay hoy..."
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Loya 3.

questions.question_text: “Bhagwānnā santnī sevā to bahu moṭā ________ maḷe.”
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: “Bhagwānnā santnī sevā to bahu moṭā puṇyavāḷāne maḷe.”

questions.question_text: “...satpuruṣhno āsharo kare tyāre game tevo pāpī hoy to paṇ ati pavitra thaī jāy chhe..."
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Vachanamrut Vadtal 14.

questions.question_text: “Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to _________ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.”
questions.explanation: The complete sentence is: “Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to vādaḷ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.”

questions.question_text: “Bhagwān ane Moṭā Sādhune āshare karīne to vādaḷ jevā dukh āvavānā hoy te paṇ ṭaḷī jāy ne sādhan karīne to kūṭī kūṭīne marī jāy to paṇ na ṭaḷe.”
questions.explanation: This quotation is from Swamini Vato 1/114.
